bug.short_desc: Use JSDoc-style format for parameter documentation

long_desc.thetext: Puh, that would be a huge step. Can we support both formats at the same time?

For the generator the new format would be a 10sec change. For the JS code it would be easy to do a global search-replace to bring it up to it as well. Migration should be easy as well. I think the generator could also support both variants without much hassle, e.g. for a deprecation period of time.
The general question would be how much worth do we see in better compatibility with the JSDoc standard. I for one would think that it would be worthwhile. This could be a first step.
Here some relevant links from a meeting:
* JSDoc 2 tag reference (final): http://code.google.com/p/jsdoc-toolkit/wiki/TagReference * JSDoc 3 tag reference (draft) http://usejsdoc.org/
